# Poisson

> Poisson distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var poisson = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/poisson' );
```

#### poisson

Poisson distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = poisson;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
